plot: Invited from Japan to work in a corporation making processed foods, an engineer finds himself torn between his boss' secretary and his boss' daughter
title: Donggyeongseo on sanai
plot_es: Invited from Japan to work in a corporation making processed foods, an engineer finds himself torn between his boss' secretary and his boss' daughter
plot_en: Invited from Japan to work in a corporation making processed foods, an engineer finds himself torn between his boss' secretary and his boss' daughter
